Name: Sudden Strike 2 Gold
About the game: At the height of World War 2, take command of German, Russian, British, American and Imperial Japanese armies on battelfields across the globe. Sudden Strike 2 expands on all aspects of the classic RTS game with new units, maps and epic campaigns. Features 5 epic campaigns and a new combat theater: The Pacific! Massive battleships, landing craft and trains Command airfields and deploy aircraft Mechanized units now have individual crews to command Dynamic weather system Contains 'Sudden Strike 2', 'Resource War' add-on and 'Total Victory' map pack Contains map editor for user-generated maps and missions
